document.full_text: the city of fort worth agreed tuesday to pay $400,000 to a patron at a gay bar who was severely injured in a police raid two years ago, a settlement that avoided a federal civil rights lawsuit.
document.title: southwest: texas: settlement in gay bar raid
lines_and_colors: the city of fort worth agreed tuesday to pay $400,000 to a patron at a gay bar who was severely injured in a police raid two years ago, a settlement that avoided a federal civil rights lawsuit.
